str2: When, whenever. From hote and an; whenever; also causatively inasmuch as.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
An animal, living creature. Neuter of a derivative of zao; a live thing, i.e. An animal.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.
A price, honor. From tino; a value, i.e. Money paid, or valuables; by analogy, esteem, or the dignity itself.
Thankfulness, gratitude; giving of thanks, thanksgiving. From eucharistos; gratitude; actively, grateful language.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: To sit, be seated, enthroned; I dwell, reside. From kata; and hemai; to sit down; figuratively, to remain, reside.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From thrao; a stately seat; by implication, power or a potentate.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
From the same as aei; properly, an age; by extension, perpetuity; by implication, the world; specially a Messianic period.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
